Class Scrabble

  • java.lang.Object
    • game_engine.Scrabble

  • public class Scrabble
extends java.lang.Object
    Integrates all game components to create a 2 player Scrabble game.
    Author:
    Rajit Banerjee, 18202817, Tee Chee Guan, 18202044, Katarina Cvetkovic, 18347921 Team 15: DarkMode
